name: Racon v1.0.0
body:
Faster version with lower memory consumption, now supports Illumina and FASTA sequences (quality values are no longer mandatory)!

Package racon-v1.0.0.tar.gz contains complete source code, including submodules.

name: Racon v0.5.0
body:
Supports all features as described in the Genome Research paper and the preprint, with some enhancements for reduced memory consumption and speed.  

Due to problems involved in packaging releases of repos which use submodules, we created an archive with all submodules preloaded. You can simply wget this archive, unpack and run `make`.  

Here is the link to the complete release:  
[racon-v0.5.0.tar.gz](https://github.com/isovic/racon/files/741519/racon-v0.5.0.tar.gz)
